  • Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device: NA

  • TensorFlow version (use command below):commit 0918aa7
    -Exact command to reproduce:
    train_dir="./train_dir"

    --clone_on_cpu=True

mkdir -p $train_dir

body:
- Have I written custom code (as opposed to using a stock example script provided in TensorFlow): NA
- OS Platform and Distribution (e.g., Linux Ubuntu 16.04):
- Mobile device (e.g. iPhone 8, Pixel 2, Samsung Galaxy) if the issue happens on mobile device: NA
- TensorFlow installed from (source or binary): source
- TensorFlow version (use command below):commit 0918aa74153664dbc61604af3cf0d66eb334c7ce
-Exact command to reproduce:
train_dir="./train_dir"
rm -rf $train_dir
mkdir -p $train_dir
python research/slim/train_image_classifier.py 
--dataset_name=imagenet 
--train_dir=$train_dir 
--dataset_dir=/lustre/dataset/tensorflow/imagenet 
--dataset_split_name=train 
--model_name=inception_v3 
--batch_size=64 
--max_number_of_steps=220 
--clone_on_cpu=True
